alert.note: Alert for Johnson; Laurens; Washington; Wilkinson (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 08 at 12:55PM EDT until further notice by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Georgia... Oconee River near Dublin affecting Wilkinson, Laurens, Washington and Johnson Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Oconee River near Dublin. * WHEN...From Saturday morning until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 21 feet, Flood stage is reached. Minor flooding begins in the woodlands and natural flood plain along the river upstream and downstream from the gage on U.S. Highway 80. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 12:45 PM EDT Friday the stage was 16.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late Saturday morning and continue rising to a crest of 24.6 feet Monday morning. - Flood stage is 21 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta.
